results.title: Rocky
results.plot: A small-time Philadelphia boxer gets a supremely rare chance to fight the world heavyweight champion in a bout in which he strives to go the distance for his self-respect.
results.stars: John G. Avildsen, Sylvester Stallone, Talia Shire, Burt Young, Carl Weathers

results.title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
results.plot: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the mysterious Darth Vader.
results.stars: George Lucas, Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher, Alec Guinness

results.title: Jaws
results.plot: When a killer shark unleashes chaos on a beach community off Cape Cod, it's up to a local sheriff, a marine biologist, and an old seafarer to hunt the beast down.
results.stars: Steven Spielberg, Roy Scheider, Robert Shaw, Richard Dreyfuss, Lorraine Gary

results.title: Willy Wonka & the Chocolate Factory
results.plot: A poor but hopeful boy seeks one of the five coveted golden tickets that will send him on a tour of Willy Wonka's mysterious chocolate factory.
results.stars: Mel Stuart, Gene Wilder, Jack Albertson, Peter Ostrum, Roy Kinnear

results.title: The Sting
results.plot: Two grifters team up to pull off the ultimate con.
results.stars: George Roy Hill, Paul Newman, Robert Redford, Robert Shaw, Charles Durning

results.title: Monty Python and the Holy Grail
results.plot: King Arthur and his Knights of the Round Table embark on a surreal, low-budget search for the Holy Grail, encountering many, very silly obstacles.
results.stars: Terry Gilliam, Terry Jones, Graham Chapman, John Cleese, Eric Idle

results.title: Barry Lyndon
results.plot: An Irish rogue wins the heart of a rich widow and assumes her dead husband's aristocratic position in 18th-century England.
results.stars: Stanley Kubrick, Ryan O'Neal, Marisa Berenson, Patrick Magee, Hardy Krüger

results.title: Papillon
results.plot: A French convict in the 1930s befriends a fellow criminal as the two of them begin serving their sentence in the South American penal colony on Devil's Island, which inspires the man to plot his escape.
results.stars: Franklin J. Schaffner, Steve McQueen, Dustin Hoffman, Victor Jory, Don Gordon

results.title: Young Frankenstein
results.plot: An American grandson of the infamous scientist, struggling to prove that his grandfather was not as insane as people believe, is invited to Transylvania, where he discovers the process that reanimates a dead body.
results.stars: Mel Brooks, Gene Wilder, Madeline Kahn, Marty Feldman, Peter Boyle

results.title: The Conversation
results.plot: A paranoid, secretive surveillance expert has a crisis of conscience when he suspects that the couple he is spying on will be murdered.
results.stars: Francis Ford Coppola, Gene Hackman, John Cazale, Allen Garfield, Frederic Forrest

results.title: Annie Hall
results.plot: Alvy Singer, a divorced Jewish comedian, reflects on his relationship with ex-lover Annie Hall, an aspiring nightclub singer, which ended abruptly just like his previous marriages.
results.stars: Woody Allen, Diane Keaton, Tony Roberts, Carol Kane

results.title: All the President's Men
results.plot: "The Washington Post" reporters Bob Woodward and Carl Bernstein uncover the details of the Watergate scandal that leads to President Richard Nixon's resignation.
results.stars: Alan J. Pakula, Dustin Hoffman, Robert Redford, Jack Warden, Martin Balsam

results.title: Cabaret
results.plot: A female girlie club entertainer in Weimar Republic era Berlin romances two men while the Nazi Party rises to power around them.
results.stars: Bob Fosse, Liza Minnelli, Michael York, Helmut Griem, Joel Grey

results.title: Solaris
results.plot: A psychologist is sent to a station orbiting a distant planet in order to discover what has caused the crew to go insane.
results.stars: Andrei Tarkovsky, Natalya Bondarchuk, Donatas Banionis, Jüri Järvet, Vladislav Dvorzhetskiy

results.title: Fiddler on the Roof
results.plot: In pre-revolutionary Russia, a Jewish peasant with traditional values contends with marrying off three of his daughters with modern romantic ideals while growing anti-Semitic sentiment threatens his village.
results.stars: Norman Jewison, Topol, Norma Crane, Leonard Frey, Molly Picon

results.title: The Outlaw Josey Wales
results.plot: Missouri farmer Josey Wales joins a Confederate guerrilla unit and winds up on the run from the Union soldiers who murdered his family.
results.stars: Clint Eastwood, Sondra Locke, Chief Dan George, Bill McKinney

results.title: Kramer vs. Kramer
results.plot: After his wife leaves him, a work-obsessed Manhattan advertising executive is forced to learn long-neglected parenting skills, but a heated custody battle over the couple's young son deepens the wounds left by the separation.
results.stars: Robert Benton, Dustin Hoffman, Meryl Streep, Jane Alexander, Justin Henry

results.title: Being There
results.plot: After the death of his employer forces him out of the only home he's ever known, a simpleminded, sheltered gardener becomes an unlikely trusted advisor to a powerful tycoon and an insider in Washington politics.
results.stars: Hal Ashby, Peter Sellers, Shirley MacLaine, Melvyn Douglas, Jack Warden

results.title: Harold and Maude
results.plot: Young, rich, and obsessed with death, Harold finds himself changed forever when he meets lively septuagenarian Maude at a funeral.
results.stars: Hal Ashby, Ruth Gordon, Bud Cort, Vivian Pickles, Cyril Cusack

results.title: Patton
results.plot: The World War II phase of the career of controversial American general George S. Patton.
results.stars: Franklin J. Schaffner, George C. Scott, Karl Malden, Stephen Young, Michael Strong

results.title: The Day of the Jackal
results.plot: In the aftermath of France allowing Algeria's independence, a group of resentful military veterans hire a professional assassin codenamed "Jackal" to kill President Charles de Gaulle.
results.stars: Fred Zinnemann, Edward Fox, Terence Alexander, Michel Auclair, Alan Badel

results.title: The Message
results.plot: This epic historical drama chronicles the life and times of Prophet Muhammad and serves as an introduction to early Islamic history.
results.stars: Moustapha Akkad, Anthony Quinn, Irene Papas, Michael Ansara, Johnny Sekka

results.title: Badlands
results.plot: An impressionable teenage girl from a dead-end town, and her older greaser boyfriend, embark on a killing spree in the South Dakota Badlands.
results.stars: Terrence Malick, Martin Sheen, Sissy Spacek, Warren Oates, Ramon Bieri

results.title: Days of Heaven
results.plot: A hot-tempered farm laborer convinces the woman he loves to marry their rich but dying boss so that they can have a claim to his fortune.
results.stars: Terrence Malick, Richard Gere, Brooke Adams, Sam Shepard, Linda Manz

results.title: Paper Moon
results.plot: During the Great Depression, a con man finds himself saddled with a young girl who may or may not be his daughter, and the two forge an unlikely partnership.
results.stars: Peter Bogdanovich, Ryan O'Neal, Tatum O'Neal, Madeline Kahn, John Hillerman

results.title: Fantastic Planet
results.plot: On a faraway planet where blue giants rule, oppressed humanoids rebel against their machine-like leaders.
results.stars: René Laloux, Barry Bostwick, Jennifer Drake, Eric Baugin, Jean Topart

results.title: The Man Who Would Be King
results.plot: Two former British soldiers in 1880s India decide to set themselves up as Kings in Kafiristan, a land where no white man has set foot since Alexander the Great.
results.stars: John Huston, Sean Connery, Michael Caine, Christopher Plummer, Saeed Jaffrey

results.title: Dersu Uzala
results.plot: The Russian army sends an explorer on an expedition to the snowy Siberian wilderness where he makes friends with a seasoned local hunter.
results.stars: Akira Kurosawa, Maksim Munzuk, Yuriy Solomin, Mikhail Bychkov, Vladimir Khrulyov

results.title: Sleuth
results.plot: A man who loves games and theater invites his wife's lover to meet him, setting up a battle of wits with potentially deadly results.
results.stars: Joseph L. Mankiewicz, Laurence Olivier, Michael Caine, Alec Cawthorne, John Matthews

results.title: Autumn Sonata
results.plot: A devoted wife is visited by her mother, a successful concert pianist who had little time for her when she was young.
results.stars: Ingmar Bergman, Ingrid Bergman, Liv Ullmann, Lena Nyman, Halvar Björk

results.title: The Discreet Charm of the Bourgeoisie
results.plot: A surreal, virtually plotless series of dreams centered around six middle-class people and their consistently interrupted attempts to have a meal together.
results.stars: Luis Buñuel, Fernando Rey, Delphine Seyrig, Paul Frankeur, Bulle Ogier

results.title: Love and Death
results.plot: In czarist Russia, a neurotic soldier and his distant cousin formulate a plot to assassinate Napoleon.
results.stars: Woody Allen, Diane Keaton, Georges Adet, Frank Adu
